records.name: Coco Bodu Hithi - 50 Percent Off Shared Roundtrip Speedboat For Stays From 1 May To September 2025

descriptions.direction: Located in Bodu Hithi, Coco Bodu Hithi is near the airport and on a private beach. Madivaru Beyru Dive Site and Baros Marine Center are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Paradise Island Beach and Angsana Beach. With windsurfing, surfing/body boarding, and swimming nearby, you'll find plenty of adventures in the water.
descriptions.general: General description: The hotel Coco Bodu Hithi is located in the vicinity of the hotel´s own sandy beach. At the beach are sun loungers and sun umbrellas free of charge. The town Male City is around 40 km away. The airport (MLE) is approx. 26 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee) 24 h a day. Amenities: The spa hotel has 100 rooms in total. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, an air conditioning, a safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 4 restaurants. You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. WiFi is available for free. Concierge service is free of charge. Room service, laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool with a children´s pool. A bar at the pool offers guests refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Half board: breakfast and dinner. Full board: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Breakfast and lunch and dinner only in selected restaurants. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Tennis (for a fee), billiards (where applicable, for a fee), darts (where applicable, for a fee), table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area and massages available for a fee. Sauna and steam bath available (where applicable for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English, German, French, Italian, Russian, Chinese and Japanese. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard. Residence Room (Private Pool - Speedboat): With heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Escape Water Villa (Private Pool - Speedboat): With heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Island Villa (Private Pool - Speedboat): With heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water Villa (Private Pool - Speedboat): With heating (centrally controlled), kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (where applicable, for a fee), internet (where applicable, for a fee) and safe (where applicable, for a fee) as well as centrally controlled air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Mandatory speedboat transfer to all the guests. Approx of 40 minutes from Male International to Resort. US$ 6/ green tax-per room per night will be charged for INFANTS who are staying with their parents.
